page.title: 13EDUCATION
page.content: There are 2 schools in the block each with a historical background. {PRESCOT HIGH SCHOOL }formerly PRESCOT GRAMMAR SCHOOL was founded in the 16th century.The will of {GILBERT LATHUM, {ARCHDEACON OF MANCH.}dated 10.10.1544 contains this Item- "I will a free gramer scole to be foundyt at Preskott.."{EDWARD IV }was one of the benefactors as also was the fourth { {EARL of DERBY}. {ECCLESTON LANE ENDS PRIMARY}was built about 1670 on what was then called Middle Hill with the proceeds of a trust of Â£300 set up by{J.Kenwrick.}By an order of the {CHARITY COMMISSIONERS of 1880 the old school was sold and in 1882 a new site at {E.L.E.,}was purchased.This site was occupied until 1970 when pressure from the parents led to the erection of a completely new building close by in{ALBANY AVE.
